subject: VAM Pro Haptic Compatibility
description_text:
Hello, I am interested in buying the VAM Pro Pedal Haptics and I was
wondering if they are compatible with the Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals, because
they are an older lineup of pedals.

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ron,     You can purchase a PlusX control box, which will enable support for the vibration motor.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
